title: Zulily: A new store every day
description:
Shop Zulily for amazing savings on big brands you love and boutique brands you haven’t met yet.
This is fun shopping at its finest. Each day, we deliver a new store chock-full of unique finds you never knew you needed, plus essentials for the people and places in your life: trendy clothes and shoes for kids and adults, home décor, beauty products and so much more. Best of all? You’ll enjoy up to 70% off prices every day. If you don’t mind waiting a little longer for shipping, you can really save a bundle!
New sales begin at 6am PT every morning and typically last three days, so when you see something fabulous, you’ve gotta get it before it’s gone! Whether you’re leveling up your health game or reorganizing that junk drawer (hey – everybody’s got one), we’re here to help you get on track. We reinvent our store daily, so you always have an opportunity to find what you’re after – and cool, unexpected items too. Get the app so you don’t miss out.
Here are just a few great things you’ll find every day:
On-trend women’s apparel for every season: tunics, casual dresses, tanks and tees, work dresses, kimonos, denim, sweaters, cardigans, coats and jackets, activewear, jewelry, scarves, hats, European fashions, bras and intimates, loungewear, athleisure, designer glasses and sunglasses, handbags
Shoes for every outfit: boots and booties, wedges and pumps, flats, leather loafers, fashion sandals, stylish sneakers, running shoes, walking shoes, orthopedic footwear, rain boots, snow boots, western boots, clogs, men’s work boots, men’s dress shoes and men’s sneakers
Home and office essentials: quilts, bedding, bathroom textiles and towels, sheets, pillows, kitchenware, cookbooks, storage and organization, dishes and mugs, pots and pans, kitchen appliances, home décor and entertaining essentials, pet beds and toys, indoor and outdoor furniture, DIY and craft supplies, gift wrap, party supplies, stationery, office organization, planners, food, snacks and drinks
Everything kids and babies need: Graphic tees and jeans, hoodies and jackets, activewear, pajamas, dresswear, coats, boots, sandals, sneakers, hats and scarves, rain gear, toys and games, books and school supplies, outdoor toys, puzzles, car seats, car seat covers, babyproofing gear, cloth diapers, feeding supplies, bedding, bedroom décor and playroom furniture
Beauty and wellness products: luxury skincare, makeup, designer cosmetics and fragrance, lotions and soaps, salon-quality haircare and nail polish, aromatherapy, essential oils, workout gear and yoga mats, healthy snacks and vitamins and supplements
Maternity essentials: maternity bottoms, nursing bras, maternity dresses, convertible tops, nursing covers and sleepwear
An important privacy note: Signing in signals your agreement with zulily’s Terms & Conditions and Privacy Practices.
https://www.zulily.com/terms-conditions
https://www.zulily.com/privacy-practices
